children.subject: In case you can't find a way to do it on lab computer, Amazon provides $100 AWS student credit which you may use on an EC2 instance. However, as a headsup, to use an GPU instance, you will need to submit a request that may take 48-72 hour to process.

history.content:
Is it possible for a student to install tensorflow and gym on the lab machines? I've tried doing this but it seems to require root access which is prohibited. I'm doing an assignment for CS 294-112 and don't have access to a computer with a GPU at home, so being able to run my assignment on the soda330 machines would be super helpful!

Thanks!
history.subject: Installing tensorflow and OpenAI gym on lab machines?
